name: Functional French-Advanced Beginner
description: Through the use of teaching materials adapted to their level, our students will continue to develop their linguistics abilities and to use them in specific situations. For instance, they will learn how to ask for information, how to refuse or accept an offer. On completion of this course, a linguistic system of basic but useful structures will have been assimilated. [36L, 12P]
exclusions: Grade 11 French/FSL102H1 or higher. Not open to native speakers of French.
